document.masterDocTitle: Beach Flies (Diptera: Tethinidae: Tethininae) From Australia and Papua New Guinea, with Descriptions of Two New Genera and Ten New Species

Remarks . This species is probably the most common tethinid fly inhabiting the shores of NSW and VIC.
